page.title: 11Planning - What is a farm?
page.content:
In{Ash}the local planning authority, {Sevenoaks District Council}have tried to enforce a policy that any new development must be linked directly to employment on the land. This has led to a couple of decisions that independently seem sound, but taken together show some strange contrasts.
For a{nursery cum garden centre {permission}was{granted}for an {agricultural labourer's cottage.} An elaborate mock oast-house was built.
A few yards away is a{farm with retail {outlet}which also has a{tropical fish {shop}in small premises, modelled on a domestic dwelling, set back and out of site from the road. This (the fish shop) the{planning authority}have {objected}to and have served an {enforcement notice.
